attributes.action: Create better graduate employment support structures
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for the government to devise a system of support through JobCentrePlus designed specifically to help graduates struggling to find work.

The aim of this petition is to work with the government to create, or better signpost, services to help graduates.
This can include counselling support services, thorough (more niche) jobseeking services & clearer information on suitable graduate employment partnership agencies nationwide.
